(Google translate below)

ğŸ—¨ï¸ GTranslate
Jiang Zhuoer: There is a high probability that the Ethereum mainnet merger will be carried out from November to December] In the news on July 17, Jiang Zhuoer said that ETH developers plan to merge ETH2.0 on September 19, but this large-scale software development Projects, the final delay is also the norm, and there are still a large number of ETH application projects that have not started testing, so it is expected that the enemy will be lenient, plus 2-3 months of redundancy (this is also the last tolerable time for the difficulty bomb to extend the block time), The probability of a merger between November and December is very high, which is in line with the convention that the bear market decline ends at the end of the year (the bear market in 2014 and 2018 will stop falling at the end of the year), with ETH as the leader to start the next round of bull market. The three actual capital aspects after ETH2.0 are positive: 1. ETH will reduce production by 90%. You think that a BTC halving will bring a big bull market, and a 90% production reduction = 3 BTC halvings. 2. The POS locked currency is expected to increase from the current 10% to 30% (according to other POS currency conventions), and more coins will be locked. 3. Coupled with the EIP-1559 burning of coins, the actual inflation has changed from positive 2.0% to negative 1.8%, opening an unprecedented era of burning deflation in the currency circle.
